eventSeen_3102768_memory_oneday: How can I possibly compete with Joja?$s#$e#Their pockets are so deep, they can just sell at a loss until little guys like me are out of business... then they'll jack up their prices!$s

AcceptGift_(O)Book_PriceCatalogue: Gripping! Fascinating! It's the perfect book for me!$h

GreenRainFinished: Well, I'm glad things are back to normal. Seems like it was all overblown... just like everything.
GreenRain_2: Glad to see you, @. What's a little toxic rain when you have seeds to buy?$h#$e#I'm just kidding. The rain seems to be completely harmless.
